name: 有機化學實驗
description: 訓練學生有機化學實驗操作的技巧，並培養實驗正確的實驗態度以及獨立思考和解決問題能力。
goals: 訓練學生有機化學實驗操作的技巧。
培養實驗正確的實驗態度。
獨立思考和解決問題能力。
syllabus: Exp.1 Simple Distillation of Ethanol Compound Exp.2 Extraction with Solvents: Separation of Benzoic Acid and Acetanilide Exp.3 Chromatography: 1. TLC Synthesis α-methylbenzyl alcohol from Acetophenone Exp.4 Chromatography: 2. FC Improvements in the Separation of β-Carotene and Lycopene by Column Chromatography Exp.5 Identification of Organic Compounds: A.Hydrocarbons: (1)Permanganate Test(Baeyer Test) (2)Bromine Test(demo.) B.Alkyl Halides: (1)Alcoholic Silver Nitrate (2)Sodium Iodide in Acetone Exp.6 Functional Group Identification (alcohols): A.Ritter Test B.Lucas Test C.Iodoform Test Exp.7 Functional Group Identification (Ald & Ketones): A. 2,4-Dinitrophenylhydrazone Test B. Tollen’s Reagent (Silver mirror Test) C. Schiff’s Fuchsin Test Exp.8 Preparation of Poly Vinyl Alcohol Exp.9 Preparation of Azo Dyes: Methyl Orange Ⅱ Exp.10 Unknown Sugar Solution Test
